front.div:
Objective:
To develop new schemes of gasification based on the concept of the
oxy-fuel process as well as the internal circulating fluidised bed (ICFB)
are studied
Adapting the concept of oxy-fuel firing for PF combustion to fluidised
bed gasification
Considering the potential of fluidised bed technology to produce H2
rich gas and CH4
Investigating the co-gasification of coal with biomass and/or waste in
fluidised beds and to consider the impact of scale of operation
Considering the impact of the above developments on the release of
tar, fuel N and S
Investigating alternative gas cleaning/separation options (e.g. for CO2
sequestration)
Benefits:
To valorise European coals along with biomass/wastes as alternative
energy source
Promoting the exploitation and utilisation of energy source that are
available within EU
Supporting the European and local policy on energy concerns.
